attributes.action: Get the Conservative party out of power
attributes.background: The British tax payer did not vote the last 2 PM into power , time for the British tax payer to have there say

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions that make requests relating to individual organisations, including political parties, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Call an immediate general election to end the chaos of the current government: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
